price: Ku bw’ibyo, ingororano yabo izaba umuriro w’iteka (Jahanamu) kubera ko bahakanye ndetse ibimenyetso byanjye n’Intumwa zanjye bakabihindura ibikinisho.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ جَزَآؤُهُمۡ جَهَنَّمُ بِمَا كَفَرُواْ وَٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ ءَايَٰتِي وَرُسُلِي هُزُوًا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: dhālika jazāuhum jahannamu bimā kafarū wa-ittakhadhū āyātī warusulī huzuwan
